title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 150.4 - Unauthorized operation of locks
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 150.4 - Unauthorized operation of locks

State Regulations

Neither the lock gates, valves, paddles, capstans, nor any
part of the machinery on or connected with a lock shall be operated by any
person other than the duly appointed lock officials; nor shall any mechanical
part of any lock be handled or interfered with by any other person. Any person
violating this section shall be subject to a penalty of not to exceed $100 for
each offense. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21

150.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
